item.description:
Every 2nd and 4th Friday evening is Dinner With Dharma at the Greater Boston Buddhist Cultural Center at 950 Massachusetts Avenue, between Central and Harvard Squares, Cambridge.

QAO (Question and answer opportunity) at the end of the talk will last about ten to fifteen minute.

We hope that you will join us and other folks Friday evening at GBBCC.

Please invite friends and family. If you have any questions, please call the GBBCC.

6:30p.m. Meditation
7:00p.m. Dinner
7:30p.m. Dharma Talk and Discussion
Buddhism at work by ivan yuan & peter martin

Cost (Include dinner)
Adult: $10 Student: $5 (student ID required)

PLEASE TAKE CASH ONLY. THEY DONT Accepts Credit Cards!!!


Take the T to Central Square, www.mbta.com.

For driving directions please check here
http://maps.google.co...


We look forward to seeing you there! We gonna be there from 6:30pm to7:30pm.

For more info. for this place, please check http://www.yelp.com/b...



See you soon.


Omitofo for the event at GBBCC

Greater Boston Buddhist Cultural Center
950 Massachusetts Avenue (#1 bus, between Red Line stops at Central Square and Harvard Square)
Cambridge, MA
617-547-6670

www.GBBC.net - Chinese language site - will get a security warning, but it's SAFE
PHOTOS of the Buddhist Tea House interior
http://www.yelp.com/b....
http://gbbcc.net/port....

For driving directions please check here
http://maps.google.co....
http://maps.google.co....
http://bit.ly/dByxK8.....
http://pluralism.org/.... - HDS Pluralism Project Profile-Greater Boston Buddhist Cultural Center (GBBCC) - includes history and statistics

We look forward to seeing you there! We'll be there from 6:30pm to 8:30pm, maybe 10 pm, if we like the talk(s).

For more info. for this place, please check http://www.yelp.com/b.... (please visit Maynard's pictures of the place)

http://www.gbbcc.net..... - IF you speak and read Mandarin



www.gbbcc.net

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner With Dharma (Thank Buddha It's Friday!)
